publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3488 Liam McArthur: Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Awardâ€”That the Parliament notes the important role that Ken Rundle has played in Scottish agriculture, both as a journalist for the BBC and as head of communications at the Scottish Agricultural College; recognises that, for over two decades, he has championed the Scottish agricultural industry, working tirelessly behind the scenes to ensure that farming stories were not forgotten by the general public while, at the same time, ensuring that even the difficult stories were covered with fairness and integrity; believes therefore that he is a worthy winner of the inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award, and offers him congratulations for winning the award.

S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Jamie Stone*, Ross Finnie*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Bill Kidd*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Rumbles*, Jim Tolson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Jim Hume*, David Stewart*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Alison McInnes*, Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Sandra White*, John Scott*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-3488 Ken Rundle, Winner of the Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Maureen Watt* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
